title: Cooked Cod Storage Time

items.name: Cooked cod (fridge)
items.details: Stays fresh for 3-4 days when stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator.

items.name: Cooked cod (freezer)
items.details: If you won't eat it within 3-4 days, freeze it for longer storage.

notes: Always store in an airtight container for best results.
